name: Grupp 6: David vs Goliath AR
description:
This demo utilizes AR technology to allow the player to spawn in an arena.

Simply tap inside the yellow area which appears to spawn in the arena and then use the joystick for movement and the button with the sword icon to attack.

There is only one other enemy inside the arena and that is a giant with two attacks: a normal swing attack and a slam that he starts doing once he falls below 60% HP.

The goal of the demo is to defeat the giant.
